channel.title: Landonsnow1
channel.description:
So the fag sends me an email:
Subject: your calling me a kid? From: Micah Berman Date: 3/23/09 7:35 PM
It's me land (you probably figured that) i am on a limited schedual so. 1. im 39 2. you have no idea what the heck your saying 3. stop saying things before thinking 4. if you wanna tlak further e-mail zerocomfor@kingscape.comyr.com -have a good day -Mike R. Andrew
I reply "u want ddos?."
More to come.
His email is zerocomfor@yahoo.com. If anyone wishes to drop dox please do so.
mit/b/ is now my personal army./
EDIT: More lulz for about this kid. Google cache of a wikipedia page he made for himself: http://74.125.95.132/search?q=cache:PdfSen3QbD0J:en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zerosoft+Micah+Berman+%2Bzerocomfor&cd=3&hl=en&ct=clnk&gl=us&client=firefox-a
screenshot rarchived 4 graet justis: http://i44.tinypic.com/1218l0n.png
also: http://micahberman.webs.com/ and: http://www.geoaccount.webs.com/ in b4: http://geoaccount.webs.com/apps/webstore/products/show/361692
also his jewtubes: http://www.youtube.com/micahberman
moar!!: http://www.tfw2005.com/boards/members/zerocomfor-64273.html
apparently this fag collects transformers and enjoys family-friendly activites. according to gikid/mepholic he was a big douchefuck on frugooscape.
he is also a security expert according to Frell (see two posts down)
edit: moar internets: yahoo answers http://answers.yahoo.com/my/profile;_ylt=Au9tz3LkM2S56I4HXq2IQ6z1xQt.;_ylv=3?show=56kRN2iPaa
